human: Can you transform the data from this chart into a structured format?

gpt:
Yes, here's the data from the chart in a structured format:

``` 
Category                               | Will focus too much (%) | Will not focus enough (%)
---------------------------------------|-------------------------|-------------------------
Dem/Lean Dem                           | 51                      | 47
Cons/Mod (Conservative/Moderate) Dems  | 55                      | 43
Liberal Dems                           | 46                      | 52
```

Note: The percentages represent the proportion of Democrats and Democratic leaners who are more concerned in the respective categories. The source of the data is the Pew Research Center, based on a survey conducted from April 29-May 13, 2019.
